snippet: Indonesia, a predominantly Muslim country, has been struggling with a new, homegrown terror threat in which lone militants and small groups wage attacks against police and minority religious groups.
lead_paragraph: Indonesia, a predominantly Muslim country, has been struggling with a new, homegrown terror threat in which lone militants and small groups wage attacks against police and minority religious groups.

headline.main: 3 in Indonesia Charged With Plotting Suicide Attacks
headline.print_headline: Three Held Over Attacks In Indonesia
headline.seo: Three in Indonesia Charged With Plotting Suicide Attacks
